sentences.sContent: It’s a paradox that in such a rich country there can be so much poverty.
sentences.sCn: 在如此富有的国家却有这么多的贫穷现象，真是矛盾。

自相矛盾地；似非而是地；反常地

trans.tranCn: 似非而是的论点, 自相矛盾的话
trans.tranOther: a situation that seems strange because it involves two ideas or qualities that are very different
